data.name: Material Dark GitHub
data.description: IMPORTANT NOTICE - 29/05/2020 *** Since userstyles.org is broken and unmaintened, I decided to move to GitHub. You can install the new version by clicking this link Home page and Instructions Support The version on this website is not up to date anymore from 29/05/2020. I won't answer to bugs or requests submitted here. *** A Material Dark Theme for GitHub. Based on Jetbrains Material theme. 3 themes available : Oceanic, Darker, Palenight If your eyes like it, I did the same on some other well-known websites with the same theme: https://userstyles.org/users/763420

data.name: miped
GitHub Gold Star
data.description: This style turns the GitHub star icon on buttons, etc. to gold, making it more apparent and easier to identify. This is best used alongside GitHub-Dark
